hero.title: Your Trusted
hero.description: MyMechanika is India's leading car service platform, dedicated to making car maintenance simple, affordable, and hassle-free for millions of car owners.

story.title: Revolutionizing Car Service in India
story.p1: Founded in 2018, MyMechanika started with a simple mission: to bring transparency and convenience to car servicing. We noticed that car owners often faced hidden charges, poor quality parts, and unreliable service providers.
story.p2: We set out to change this by building a network of certified mechanics, partnering with OEM suppliers, and creating a technology platform that gives car owners complete visibility into their service.
story.p3: Today, we've serviced over 2 million cars across 50+ cities, and we're just getting started. Our vision is to be every car owner's trusted partner for all their vehicle needs.
